bug.author: neerajprad
bug.summary: Tests giving incorrect results on CUDA
bug.description:
I am trying to fix tests that don't work with CUDA..e.g. by adjusting precision, changing functions that do not have CUDA implementations, etc. Following is a working list of tests that are giving incorrect results, and which seem to have deeper issues:
#1057 tests/contrib/gp/test_models.py::test_inference - Results are too inaccurate. cc.@fehiepsi

comments.comment: I will look into this problem now.
